text: Martina Hingis and Anna Kournikova were the defending champions, but were forced to withdraw as Hingis suffered an ankle injury. Lindsay Davenport and Lisa Raymond won the title by defeating Sandrine Testud and Roberta Vinci 6–3, 2–6, 6–2 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==External links== * Main and qualifying draws (WTA) Category:Zurich Open Doubles
title: 2001 Swisscom Challenge – Doubles
